Title: When Wedding Bells Thaw
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Merriwether Williams (story), Timothy McKeon (story), Kent Osborne, Niki Yang
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Kerri Kenney
Plot: The Ice King announces that he is engaged and to the shock of Finn and Jake it seems the bride is actually willing. But will the Ice King give up his princess kidnapping ways?
